message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire [product name] for a price of $2000000. This is a significant investment, but I believe the potential benefits to you will far outweigh the cost. This product is highly valuable and has the potential to [briefly mention potential benefits for Bob]. I understand you may need time to consider this offer, and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have. If you're not interested at this time, I will be selling it to another buyer for $1500000.
